description: Released v1.9.0 with complete type & identifier intelligence. Committed 409 files (66 new, 341 modified, cargo fmt across codebase), tagged as v1.9.0, pushed to origin/main. All 5 GPT-5.1 findings production-verified and shipped: type persistence (2,776 types), identifier persistence (61,440 identifiers), fast_refs filtering, type-aware embeddings, fast_explore Types mode. Includes 35 development memory checkpoints documenting systematic TDD implementation. 32,610 insertions, 8,589 deletions. Zero regressions, 100% validation confidence.
